maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: This will be the last pillar enemy! We'll let \c[3]you decide\c[0] which element to attack this time!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: C'est le dernier ennemi pilier ! On va \c[3]vous laisser décider\c[0] quel élément attaquer en premier !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Decide quickly! I want to start hitting stuff!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Décidez-vous vite ! Je veux frapper des trucs !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Hey! Which element should be destroy?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Hé ! Quel élément on doit détruire ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Oh dear... It' seems like Lea is all alone right now. Let's wait for Emilie or Tronny to respawn.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Oh non... On dirait que Lea est toute seule maintenant. Attendons qu'Emilie ou Tronny réapparaissent.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: \c[3]Red blocks\c[0]! \c[3]Heat\c[0] is under fire now!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Les \c[3]Blocs Rouges\c[0] ! le \c[3]Chaud\c[0] est sous le feu !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: You waited for that one, didn't you?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Tu as attendu pour la sortir, celle-là, hein ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: We're attacking the \c[3]Red blocks\c[0] now!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On attaque les \c[3]Blocs Rouges\c[0] maintenant !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Defeat all \c[3]Red Blocks\c[0]!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Combattez tous les \c[3]Blocs Rouges\c[0] !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: \c[0]Blue blocks\c[0]! It's time to \c[3]break the ice\c[0]! Cool, delicious ice.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Les Blocs bleus ! Il est temps de \c[3]briser la glace\c[0] ! De la bonne glace, bien fraiche !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Monsieur, you gotta keep that craving for ice cream under control.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Monsieur, il va falloir mettre ton envie pressante de glaces sous contrôle.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: We're fighting the \c[0]Blue blocks\c[0]! It's a shame that Tronny is out. I'm sure those are his favorites.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On combat les Blocs Bleus ! Dommage que Tronny soit KO Je suis sûr que c'est ses préférés.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Defeat all \c[3]Blue Blocks\c[0]!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Combattez tous les \c[3]Blocs Bleus\c[0] !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Uhm we attack those \c[3]purple blocks\c[0] now. The shock blocks!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Heu, on attaque ces \c[3]blocs violets\c[0] maintenant. Les blocs chocs !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: What a \c[3]shocking\c[0] turn of events!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Ça doit leur faire un \c[3]choc\c[0] pour ces blocs !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: We're fighting those \c[3]Purple blocks\c[0] now! Let's be quick as lightning!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On combat ces \c[3]Blocs Violets\c[0] maintenant ! Soyons rapides comme l'éclair !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Defeat all \c[3]Purple Blocks\c[0]!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Combattez tous les \c[3]Blocs Violets\c[0] !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: \c[3]Greenish blocks\c[0] now. Nope. No pun, I got nothing. What's this element anyway?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Les \c[3]Blocs Verts\c[0] maintenant. Bon, désolé, j'ai pas de blague pour eux. C'est quoi cet élément, en fait ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: We're fighting the \c[3]Greenish blocks\c[0] now. Whatever those are...
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On combat les \c[3]Blocs Verts\c[0] maintenant. Peu importe ce que c'est...

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: That's \c[3]Wave\c[0]. And honestly, nobody quite knows what it is.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: C'est l'élément \c[3]Onde\c[0]. Et personne ne sait vraiment ce que c'est.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: It's the element of peace and good vibrations! Let's smash it, everyone!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: C'est l'élément de la paix et des ondes positives ! Cassez-moi tout ça, les gens !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Defeat all \c[3]Green Blocks\c[0]!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Combattez tous les \c[3]Blocs Verts\c[0] !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: All done on our side!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On a tout fini de notre côté !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Out cold! All blue blocks, that is.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Tous les blocs bleus ont été refroidis !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: All purple blocks defeated!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Tous les blocs violets sont vaincus !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: The element of peace is no more.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: L'élément de la paix n'est plus.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Hm.... that is odd...
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Hum... C'est bizarre...

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Nevermind, I must be imagining things.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Oublie, j'ai dû imaginer des trucs.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: en_US
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: fr_FR

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: en_US
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: fr_FR

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: en_US
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: fr_FR

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Here we are! Time for the final stage! Everyone ready?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Nous y voilà ! Il est temps d'aller vers la dernière étape ! Tout le monde est prêt ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Very much!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Et comment !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Wait...\. something is not right here!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Attends...\. Il y a quelque chose qui cloche !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Nice work! Next color!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Bon travail ! Couleur suivante !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: Very good, everyone!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: Bon travail, tout le monde !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: We almost got it!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On y est presque !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.orig: We almost got it!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-04-cave.json/.text: On y est presque !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Is... Is this some kind of bug?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: C'est... c'est un bug ou quoi ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Damn it! Why now of all times!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Bon sang ! Pourquoi ça tombe maintenant !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: So...\. next should be the boss, right?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Donc...\. Le prochain truc c'est le boss, non ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Hear us boss?\. We're ready to take\. you\. ON!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Tu nous entends, le boss ?\. Maintenant\. c'est\. ton\. tour !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Yes, yes.\. Let's beat the boss already!
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Oui, oui.\. Finissons-en avec le boss !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Living my fake life to the fullest here.
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Je profite au maximum de ma fausse vie là.

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Look...\. If this is about what I said before...\. I'm sorry, okay?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Luke...\. Si c'est à propos de ce que j'ai dit avant...\. Je suis désolé, OK ?
Luke !\. Ne parle pas sur ce ton !

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: I don't understand what's going on here, but please...
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Je comprends pas ce qui se passe ici, mais s'il vous plait...

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: Can we \.PLEASE\. just finish this raid?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: Est-ce qu'on peut\. S'IL VOUS PLAIT\. juste finir ce raid ?

maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.orig: There's still time to settle everything afterwards, non?
maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-05.json/entit.text: On peut toujours régler ça plus tard, non ?
Il est où le boss, là ?
